TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWebEditable

summary.span: 为开发人员提供接口，以指定与 控件相关联的自定义编辑控件。

span.span: Provides an interface for developers to specify custom editing controls that are associated with a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口，可将自定义相关联控件与服务器控件-如控件、 一个用户控件或自定义服务器控件。The interface enables you to associate custom controls with a server control--such as a control, a user control, or a custom server control. 使用包含控件控件，并具有其编辑控件的此区域提供用于修改属性、 外观和行为关联的用户界面 (UI) 的最终用户控件。The controls are contained with an control, and this zone with its editing controls provides end users with a user interface (UI) for modifying properties, appearance, and behavior on the associated control. 接口包含两个公开的成员。The interface includes two exposed members. 属性提供了一种方法控件，以获得对关联的服务器控件的引用。The property provides a way for controls to get a reference to the associated server control. 方法用于创建的每个自定义实例控件与服务器控件关联，并将其返回为一个集合。The method is used to create an instance of each custom control associated with a server control, and return them as a collection. 基类上已实现接口类，尽管默认情况下任何自定义不会将此实现关联控制与类。The interface is already implemented on the base class, although by default this implementation does not associate any custom controls with the class. 若要将关联的派生使用的自定义控件控件，可以重写方法。To associate a derived control with custom controls, you can override the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写的方法中自定义界面控件，然后创建一个自定义的一个实例控制何时控件进入编辑模式。The following code example demonstrates how to override the methods of the interface in a custom control, which then creates an instance of a custom control when the control enters edit mode. 此示例中有四个部分：This example has four parts: - 自定义类的代码。The code for the custom class. - 承载自定义控件的网页。The Web page that hosts the custom control. - 将页切换到编辑模式下一个用户控件。A user control that switches the page into edit mode. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。A description of how the example works in a browser. 代码示例的第一个部分是自定义`TextDisplayWebPart`类。The first part of the code example is the custom `TextDisplayWebPart` class. 请注意，类派生自类并实现界面，提供特定的实现方法和属性。Notice that the class derives from the class and implements the interface, providing specific implementations for the method and the property. 此外请注意，嵌套在`TextDisplayWebPart`类是私有的自定义`TextDisplayEditorPart`类派生自基类。Notice also that nested within the `TextDisplayWebPart` class is a private, custom `TextDisplayEditorPart` class that derives from the base class. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示这两种方法编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#1)] 代码示例的第二部分是承载自定义控件的网页。The second part of the code example is a Web page that hosts the custom control. 请注意，尽管页上，自定义的标记中声明控件控件无需引用，因为可以在运行时以编程方式添加。Notice that although an control is declared in the markup of the page, the custom control need not be referenced there, because it can be added programmatically at run time. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/CS/editorpart_overview_cs.aspx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/VB/editorpart_overview_vb.aspx#7)] 代码示例的第三个部分是使用户能够切换到页的用户控件编辑模式。The third part of the code example is a user control that enables a user to switch the page into edit mode. 请注意，在托管的 Web 页面中引用用户控件。Notice that the user control is referenced in the hosting Web page. 有关如何创建此用户控件的完整说明，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For a full description of how to create this user control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/CS/displaymodeuccs.ascx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/VB/displaymodeucvb.ascx#8)] 若要运行的代码示例，加载托管的 Web 页面的浏览器中，将一些文本添加到文本框中，然后单击**集标签内容**按钮更新该控件中的标签。To run the code example, load the hosting Web page in a browser, add some text to the text box, and click the **Set Label Content** button to update the label in the control. 若要切换到编辑模式下的页上，选择**编辑**从下拉列表，其中包含显示模式。To switch the page into edit mode, select **Edit** from the drop-down list containing the display modes. 若要显示来自自定义 UI`TextDisplayEditorPart`控件中，单击谓词菜单下拉箭头`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，并选择**编辑**。To display the UI from the custom `TextDisplayEditorPart` control, click the verbs menu drop-down arrow on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and select **Edit**. 在编辑用户界面，可以使用下拉列表，其中包含字体样式来更新中的标签的文本样式`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。In the editing UI, you can use the drop-down list containing the font styles to update the text style for the label in the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 您必须单击**浏览模式**在编辑模式下在将页返回到普通视图并确认该标签中的文本现在具有的字体样式的显示模式下拉列表中选择。You must click **Browse Mode** in the display modes drop-down list to return the page to normal view and confirm that the text in the label now has the font style you selected while in edit mode.

para.span: 如果想要使用的不是服务器控件Web 部件应用程序中的控件 (即，如果添加到这些控件区域)，如果希望将关联自定义和到需要使用此类服务器控件的控件，实现接口。

span.span: If you want to use server controls that are not controls in a Web Parts application (that is, if you add these controls to a zone), and if you want to associate custom controls with such server controls, you need to implement the interface.

para.span: 派生控件不应实现该接口，因为基类已执行操作。

span.span: Derived controls should not implement the interface, because the base class already does so.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection CreateEditorParts() cil managed

summary.span: 返回实现 接口的服务器控件的关联自定义 控件的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of custom controls associated with a server control that implements the interface.

returns.span: ，包含服务器控件的关联自定义 控件的集合。

span.span: An that contains the collection of custom controls associated with a server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法，可创建的所有自定义集合自定义控件，与关联控件控件或用户控件，并将其作为返回对象。The method enables you to create a collection of all the custom controls associated with your custom control, control, or user control, and return them as an object. 控件集合，并创建的所有实例控件时服务器控件进入编辑模式。The control takes the collection and creates instances of all the controls whenever the server control enters edit mode. 在自定义实现此方法通常控件通过重写其方法。Typically you implement this method in a custom control by overriding its method. 在方法中，创建自定义的实例你想要将与您的控件相关联的控件将其添加到对象，并返回该对象。In the method, you create instances of the custom controls you want to associate with your controls, add them to an object, and then return that object. 集合控件然后分配给属性的区域。The collection of controls is then assigned to the property of the zone. > [!NOTE] > 任何添加到的集合的实现中的控件方法必须具有分配给其 ID 属性的值，否则将集合分配给时引发异常属性。Any that is added to the collection of controls in an implementation of the method must have a value assigned to its ID property, otherwise an exception will be thrown when the collection is assigned to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的重写中自定义方法控件。The following code example demonstrates an override of the method in a custom control. 在示例部分中找到所需运行示例的完整源代码类概述主题。The complete source code required to run the sample is found in the Example section of the class overview topic. 代码示例包含的两个成员接口。The code example contains both members of the interface. 请注意，重写方法创建收集一个或多个自定义控件，并使用列表创建对象。Note that the override of the method creates an to collect one or more custom controls, and then uses the list to create the object. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#4)]

para.span: 对象的方法返回是只读的并且没有可访问的方法，若要向其添加各个控件。

span.span: The object that the method returns is read-only and has no accessible method to add individual controls to it.

para.span: 但是，在重写或方法的实现中，您可以创建另一个有点对象，例如，以便包含所有自定义控件，并将其传递给构造函数中，当您创建一个新对象.

span.span: However, in your override or implementation of the method, you can create another kind of object, such as an , to contain all the custom controls, and pass it to the constructor when you create a new object.

para.span: 有关代码示例，请参阅示例部分。

span.span: For a code example, see the Example section.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WebBrowsableObject As Object
public: property System::Object ^ WebBrowsableObject { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取对将由 控件编辑的 控件、用户控件或自定义控件的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the control, user control, or custom control that will be edited by controls.

value.span: 对 控件的关联控件的对象引用。

span.span: An object reference to the control associated with an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供了一种方法控件，以获得对与之关联的服务器控件的引用。The property provides a way for controls to get a reference to the server controls they are associated with. 尽管属性本身是只读的但它将返回的对象引用，控件来更改服务器控件中的值。Although the property itself is read-only, the object reference that it returns enables controls to change values in the server control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何属性可以在自定义重写控件。The following code example demonstrates how the property can be overridden in a custom control. 在示例部分中找到所需运行该示例的完整源代码类概述主题。The complete source code required to run the example is found in the Example section of the class overview topic. 该代码示例重写的两个成员接口。The code example overrides both members of the interface. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IWebEditable_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#4)]

para.span: 通常情况下，实现服务器控件中的属性，只需返回到服务器控件本身的引用。

span.span: Normally, when you implement the property in a server control, you simply return a reference to the server control itself.

para.span: 情况下类，因为它包装一个子控件，以使其能够充当控件，其实现属性返回的子控件的引用。

span.span: In the case of the class, because it wraps a child control to enable it to function as a control, its implementation of the property returns a reference to the child control.
